Entries.Mon8: #$1 Caroline23#When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the Wizard's tower. I... wish I would've told Pierre what I did before he passed.#$e#Abigail was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if she'll ever experience life outside the valley?
Entries.Thu: #$1 Caroline1#Mmm... I guess I'm cooking dinner for myself, tonight.#$e#Hmmm... what am I going to make for dinner tonight?#$e#Maybe I'll just get take-out from the Saloon.
Entries.Sat6: #$1 Caroline12#When we first moved here, I took a while to settle down... I wasn't ready for the domestic life.#$e#Pierre was a bit traditional... but he was a good man. He was ambitious, but he always put his family first. I do truly miss him...$s

Entries.Resort_Entering: I was so hungry on the ride over, I started digging through Willy's stuff to find some food.#$b#He had some fish jerky... and I'm still chewing on it.

Entries.fall_25.002: Excuse me, I have to say some things to Nurse Maru in private...$u
Entries.fall_25.001: You're here for a checkup too? What happened?

Entries.fall_25.002: Excuse me, I have to say some things to Magnus in private...$u
Entries.fall_25.001: You're here for a checkup too? What happened?

Entries.Tue.001: Whew... gotta stay in shape. Trust me, @, when you get older, you'll know how important this is!

Entries.winter_16.000: I'm getting all my holiday shopping done tonight! Let me know if you see Abigail coming...
